articles.title: Publix, CVS to accept vaccine appointments for people 50 and older - WKMG News 6 & ClickOrlando
articles.description: Publix is now accepting vaccine appointments for any Floridian over the age of 50. CVS will accept appointments for any Floridian over the age of 50 on Monday.
